titleStmt.title: A proclamation for proroguing the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Ampthill the xxviij. day of Iuly, in the third yeere of our reigne ... .
Setting 5 Nov. as the date. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
